document.full_text: samuel curtis johnson iii, a billionaire heir of the sc johnson & son fortune, has been charged with repeated sexual assault of his stepdaughter, officials said on friday.
document.title: sc johnson heir charged with sex assault of child
lines_and_colors: samuel curtis johnson iii, a billionaire heir of the sc johnson & son fortune, has been charged with repeated sexual assault of his stepdaughter, officials said on friday.
